verses.text: I \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w standing|strong="H5324"\w* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*: and he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Smite|strong="H5221"\w* the lintel of the \w door|strong="H3730"\w*, that the \w posts|strong="H5592"\w* may \w shake|strong="H7493"\w*: and \w cut|strong="H1214"\w* them in the \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, all of them; and I will \w slay|strong="H2026"\w* the \w last|strong="H0319"\w* of them with the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*: he that \w fleeth|strong="H5127"\w* of them shall not flee \w away|strong="H5127"\w*, and he that \w escapeth|strong="H6412"\w* of them shall not be \w delivered|strong="H4422"\w*.\f + \fr 9.1 \ft lintel: or, chapiter, or, knop\f*\f + \fr 9.1 \ft cut…: or, wound them\f*

Though they \w dig|strong="H2864"\w* into \w hell|strong="H7585"\w*, thence shall mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* them; though they climb \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, thence will I bring them \w down|strong="H3381"\w*:

And though they \w hide|strong="H2244"\w* themselves in the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of \w Carmel|strong="H3760"\w*, I will \w search|strong="H2664"\w* and take them \w out|strong="H3947"\w* thence; and though they be \w hid|strong="H5641"\w* from my \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* in the \w bottom|strong="H7172"\w* of the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, thence will I \w command|strong="H6680"\w* the \w serpent|strong="H5175"\w*, and he shall \w bite|strong="H5391"\w* them:

And though they \w go|strong="H3212"\w* into \w captivity|strong="H7628"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* their \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, thence will I \w command|strong="H6680"\w* the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and it shall \w slay|strong="H2026"\w* them: and I will \w set|strong="H7760"\w* mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* upon them for \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, and not for \w good|strong="H2896"\w*.

And the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \add is\add* he that \w toucheth|strong="H5060"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and it shall \w melt|strong="H4127"\w*, and all that \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* therein shall \w mourn|strong="H0056"\w*: and it shall rise \w up|strong="H5927"\w* wholly like a \w flood|strong="H2975"\w*; and shall be \w drowned|strong="H8257"\w*, as \add by\add* the \w flood|strong="H2975"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\add It is\add* he that \w buildeth|strong="H1129"\w* his \w stories|strong="H4609"\w* in the \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and hath \w founded|strong="H3245"\w* his \w troop|strong="H0092"\w* in the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*; he that \w calleth|strong="H7121"\w* for the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* of the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, and poureth them \w out|strong="H8210"\w* upon the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.\f + \fr 9.6 \ft stories: or, spheres: Heb. ascensions\f*\f + \fr 9.6 \ft troop: or, bundle\f*

\add Are\add* ye not as \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w Ethiopians|strong="H3569"\w* unto me, O \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*? \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*. Have not I brought \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*? and the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* from \w Caphtor|strong="H3731"\w*, and the \w Syrians|strong="H0758"\w* from \w Kir|strong="H7024"\w*?

Behold, the \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d* \add are\add* upon the \w sinful|strong="H2403"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w*, and I will \w destroy|strong="H8045"\w* it from off the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0127"\w*; \w saving|strong="H0657"\w* that I will not \w utterly|strong="H8045"\w* \w destroy|strong="H8045"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

For, lo, I will \w command|strong="H6680"\w*, and I will \w sift|strong="H5128"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* among all \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, like as \add corn\add* is \w sifted|strong="H5128"\w* in a \w sieve|strong="H3531"\w*, yet shall not the least \w grain|strong="H6872"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* upon the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.\f + \fr 9.9 \ft sift: Heb. cause to move\f*\f + \fr 9.9 \ft grain: Heb. stone\f*

All the \w sinners|strong="H2400"\w* of my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, which \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* shall not \w overtake|strong="H5066"\w* nor \w prevent|strong="H6923"\w* us.

¶ In that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* will I raise \w up|strong="H6965"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="H5521"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* that is \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w*, and close \w up|strong="H1443"\w* the \w breaches|strong="H6556"\w* thereof; and I will raise \w up|strong="H6965"\w* his \w ruins|strong="H2034"\w*, and I will \w build|strong="H1129"\w* it as in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w old|strong="H5769"\w*:\f + \fr 9.11 \ft close: Heb. hedge, or, wall\f*

That they may \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* the \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* of \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*, and of all the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, which are \w called|strong="H7121"\w* by my \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* that \w doeth|strong="H6213"\w* this.\f + \fr 9.12 \ft which…: Heb. upon whom my name is called\f*

Behold, the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that the \w plowman|strong="H2790"\w* shall \w overtake|strong="H5066"\w* the \w reaper|strong="H7114"\w*, and the \w treader|strong="H1869"\w* of \w grapes|strong="H6025"\w* him that \w soweth|strong="H4900"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*; and the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* shall \w drop|strong="H5197"\w* sweet \w wine|strong="H6071"\w*, and all the \w hills|strong="H1389"\w* shall \w melt|strong="H4127"\w*.\f + \fr 9.13 \ft soweth: Heb. draweth forth\f*\f + \fr 9.13 \ft sweet: or, new\f*

And I will bring \w again|strong="H7725"\w* the \w captivity|strong="H7622"\w* of my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and they shall \w build|strong="H1129"\w* the \w waste|strong="H8074"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, and \w inhabit|strong="H3427"\w* \add them;\add* and they shall \w plant|strong="H5193"\w* \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w*, and \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* the \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* thereof; they shall also \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w gardens|strong="H1593"\w*, and \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of them.

And I will \w plant|strong="H5193"\w* them upon their \w land|strong="H0127"\w*, and they shall no more be pulled \w up|strong="H5428"\w* out of their \w land|strong="H0127"\w* which I have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* them, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.
